name: Burg_438
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with Riveric loanwords
diet: salted fish, seaweed, preserved shellfish
customs: tide-based rites and small-boat festivals
constraints: No instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
Ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
Long-range mind influence is rare and institutionally banned
notes: Navigational auguries used but do not replace charts
